name: Yindii
description: Yindii is a mobile app connecting quality restaurants, bakeries, hotels & grocery stores with surplus food to consumers. Merchants sells “surprise bags” at affordable prices that customers can pickup at the end of the day. It’s a WIN-WIN-WIN for the merchant, the consumer and the planet.
